ValidationRule.description: Validation of SSN field limit size is 10 and duplicate values not allowed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( NOT(ISNULL(SSN__c)), OR( LEN(TEXT(SSN__c)) > 10, NOT(REGEX(TEXT(SSN__c), "^[0-9]{1,10}$")) ), false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: SSN cannot be longer than 10 characters.
